displayName: Cloud Run Latency p95 > 1s â€“ natacha-health-monitor

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch cloud_run_revision
| metric 'run.googleapis.com/request_latencies'
| filter (resource.service_name == 'natacha-health-monitor')
| group_by 1m, [p95: percentile(value.request_latencies, 95)]
| every 1m
| condition p95 > 1000 "ms"

documentation.content: La latencia p95 supera 1s en Cloud Run para el servicio natacha-health-monitor.
